constructor-arg.value: select * from T_CMS_MODULE_INSTANCE where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

select * from T_CMS_MODULE_INSTANCE where lifecycle !=2
#if($name) and NAME=:name #end #if($nameForLike) and NAME like :nameForLike #end
#if($code) and CODE=:code #end
#if($templateId) and TEMPLATE_ID=:templateId #end
#if($createTimeStart) and CREATE_TIME >= :createTimeStart #end
#if($createTimeEnd) and CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeEnd #end
#if($modifyTimeStart) and MODIFY_TIME >= :modifyTimeStart #end
#if($modifyTimeEnd) and MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeEnd #end
#if($isPublished == true) and ISPUBLISHED=:isPublished #end #if($ispublished == false) and ISPUBLISHED=:ispublished #end #if($id) and id=:id #end

select * from T_CMS_MODULE_INSTANCE where
lifecycle !=2
#if($name) and NAME=:name #end #if($nameForLike) and NAME like :nameForLike #end
#if($code) and CODE=:code #end
#if($templateId) and TEMPLATE_ID=:templateId #end
#if($createTime) and CREATE_TIME >= :createTimeStart #end #if($createTime) and CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeEnd #end
#if($modifyTime) and MODIFY_TIME >= :modifyTimeStart #end #if($modifyTime) and MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeEnd #end
#if($lifecycle) and LIFECYCLE=:lifecycle #end
#if($ispublished == true) and ISPUBLISHED=:ispublished #end #if($ispublished == false) and ISPUBLISHED=:ispublished #end #if($lifecycle) and lifecycle =:lifecycle #end
update T_CMS_MODULE_INSTANCE set lifecycle=:state where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)
update T_CMS_MODULE_INSTANCE set lifecycle=2, ispublished=false where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

select * from T_CMS_MODULE_INSTANCE where lifecycle=1
#if($name) and NAME=:name #end #if($nameForLike) and NAME like :nameForLike #end
#if($code) and CODE=:code #end
#if($templateId) and TEMPLATE_ID=:templateId #end
#if($createTime) and CREATE_TIME >= :createTimeStart #end #if($createTime) and CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeEnd #end
#if($modifyTime) and MODIFY_TIME >= :modifyTimeStart #end #if($modifyTime) and MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeEnd #end
#if($lifecycle) and LIFECYCLE=:lifecycle #end
#if($isPublished) and ISPUBLISHED=:isPublished #end #if($isPublished == false) and ISPUBLISHED=:isPublished #end

select * from T_CMS_MODULE_INSTANCE where lifecycle=1
#if($name) and NAME=:name #end #if($nameForLike) and NAME like :nameForLike #end
#if($code) and CODE=:code #end
#if($templateId) and TEMPLATE_ID=:templateId #end
#if($createTime) and CREATE_TIME >= :createTimeStart #end #if($createTime) and CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeEnd #end
#if($modifyTime) and MODIFY_TIME >= :modifyTimeStart #end #if($modifyTime) and MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeEnd #end
#if($lifecycle) and LIFECYCLE=:lifecycle #end
#if($isPublished) and ISPUBLISHED=:isPublished #end #if($isPublished == false) and ISPUBLISHED=:isPublished #end

select * from T_CMS_MODULE_INSTANCE where lifecycle !=2
#if($code) and CODE=:code #end
#if($id) and id !=:id #end
select * from T_CMS_MODULE_INSTANCE where lifecycle !=2 and TEMPLATE_ID in ( #foreach( $id in $ids) $id, #end -1)
